description: First group project completed for TechNative Academy. Website using vanilla HTML, CSS and JS. My role was to create the index page.
Second group project of TechNative Academy, which utilises React-Redux to create API calls to ChatGPT. My role included handling the API calls using redux thunk and styling the ask and home page.

Third group project of TechNative Academy, a full stack project where users can add a bags and its contents. The project was completed with a quad programming approach. Note: The database for this app is hosted on Render so the website may take up to 50 seconds to retrieve information.
A discord bot that retrieves data from RatAPI to send users cute rat images and facts.
An API that allows users to retrieve images of rats or facts about rats.
A CLI app that allows you to interact with and modify a MySQL cookbook database using an API.
